channel.title: Bluurrs client dnt work with devo 2.4
channel.description:
hey i downloaded devo 2.4 and tryed to log in to the server with bluurrs client and it just kicks me out within seconds
heres what i get in my run server
[code]Devolution-X initialised. Loading npcs... drops... spawn list...done! Connection from ********:49933 Mod dan: character file not found. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.process(client.java:10344) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:259) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Devolution [fatal] - exception [client-1-Mod dan]: Logout ClientHandler: Client Mod dan disconnected (*********)
[/code]
can i make it work with the server or not?
thanks :D

item.title: Bluurrs client dnt work with devo 2.4
item.dc:creator: @dantotman dantotman
item.description:
@dantotman wrote:

hey i downloaded devo 2.4 and tryed to log in to the server with bluurrs client and it just kicks me out within seconds

heres what i get in my run server

[code]Devolution-X initialised.
Loading npcs… drops… spawn list…done!
Connection from :49933
Mod dan: character file not found.
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182)
at client.process(client.java:10344)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:259)
at process.run(process.java:16)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Devolution [fatal] - exception
[client-1-Mod dan]: Logout
ClientHandler: Client Mod dan disconnected (*)

[/code]

can i make it work with the server or not?

thanks
